decreaseJourneyCapacity(uint256,uint256).details: Decreases a journey's available capacity once a shipment is confirmed. Should only be callable by the Brokerage contract.

listJourney(uint256,string,string,uint25.details: Lists a journey for a vessel NFT. Only the NFT owner can call this.

params._availableCapacity: The available cargo capacity for this journey.
params._vesselTokenId: The token ID of the vessel undertaking the journey.
